github.releaseNotes: npx auto-changelog --stdout --sort-commits date-desc --commit-limit false -u --template /release.hbs --ignore-commit-pattern 'Automated release [0-9\.]\+ \|Autobuild of storybook docs\|Add Sonarqube tag using .* addons list\|\[[jJ][eE][nN][kK][iI][nN][sS]\|[yY][aA][rR][nN]'

hooks.after:bump: npx auto-changelog --sort-commits date-desc  --commit-limit false -p --template /eea.hbs --ignore-commit-pattern 'Automated release [0-9\.]\+ \|Autobuild of storybook docs\|Add Sonarqube tag using .* addons list\|\[[jJ][eE][nN][kK][iI][nN][sS]\|[yY][aA][rR][nN]'
